text: Volodymyr Bulhakov (; 1 January 1947 – 18 May 2003) is a former professional Soviet football Midfielder and coach. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:2003 deaths Category:People from Dunaivtsi Raion Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:SC Lutsk players Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Metalist Kharkiv players Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:Soviet Top League players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC SKA-Karpaty Lviv managers Category:FC Krystal Kherson managers Category:FC Karpaty Lviv managers Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi managers Category:Korona Kielce managers Category:FC Rava Rava-Ruska managers Category:Ukrainian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Poland Category:Association football midfielders
title: Volodymyr Bulhakov
